title: SALIOREL
description: Useful timetable and school planner app for cantonal schools in Zurich

pressArticles.title: saliokan – Stundenplan, Mensa und Noten für Kantonsschulen

story:
SALIOREL was created back in 2014 as a simple website to check the KZO timetable and has evolved into a sophisticated application, used over 1.6 million times in total.

The current version of saliorel.com allows KZO students and teachers to check their timetables, cafeteria menues and more – with a full grade calculator and school planner included. Previously, the iOS and Android app named "saliokan" was also available for over 18+ cantonal schools in and around Zurich.

Soon, these platforms will converge in the new SALIOREL 6 – the best version yet – that is more modern and more useful than ever before.
